text: Regen is a Landkreis (district) in Bavaria, Germany. The district is entirely located in the Bavarian Forest. It is named after the Regen river. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Regen #Viechtach #Zwiesel #Achslach #Arnbruck #Bayerisch Eisenstein #Bischofsmais #BÃ¶brach #Bodenmais #Drachselsried #Frauenau #Geiersthal #Gotteszell 11.
